item.title: [DOXIA-425] Trailing spaces breaks Snippet Macro
item.description:
I am using the snippet macro to produce my sites documentation, however if there is a trailling space after the closing "}", the snippet macro cannot find the file.

For example this works:

"%{snippet|id=myid|file=src/main/resources/myfile.xml}"

Whereas this generates an error:

"%{snippet|id=myid|file=src/main/resources/myfile.xml}  "
